sentences.en: A cluster of vultures crouched on the carcass of a dead buffalo.
sentences.cn: 一群秃鹫蹲伏在一具野牛的尸体上。

sentences.en: Buffalo meat and milk are sold widely in Amazon towns and villages.
sentences.cn: 水牛肉和奶在亚马孙河流域也畅销城乡各地.

sentences.en: Don't buffalo me into doing something I don't want to do.
sentences.cn: 别威胁我做我不想做的事.

sentences.en: Great herds of buffalo migrated across the plains.
He's got his own little pizza place up in Buffalo.
sentences.cn: 他在布法罗市开了个小小的烤馅饼店.

sentences.en: Humans then may develop living communities where the deer, buffalo, elk and bear, or elephant, giraffe and hippo freely roam again.
sentences.cn: 或许有一天，人类会组织生活社区，在那里鹿、野牛、麋鹿、熊、大象、长颈鹿和河马会再一次自由倘佯。

sentences.en: Indians hunted the prairie for buffalo.
sentences.cn: 印第安人在北美大草原上捕猎野牛.

sentences.en: Once there were 70 million buffalo on the plains.
sentences.cn: 北美大平原上曾有过7,000万头野牛。

sentences.en: South America has produced the world's most spectacular successes with commercial water buffalo herds.
sentences.cn: 在培育商业性水牛群方面,世界上要数南美洲的成就最为可观.

sentences.en: That the future of the child in Buffalo is our future.
sentences.cn: 布法罗儿童的前途就是我们的前途.

sentences.en: The boots are made of buffalo hide.
sentences.cn: 这双靴子是由水牛皮制成的。

sentences.en: The festival commemorates the slaying of the demon buffalo.
sentences.cn: 那个节日是为了纪念杀死魔牛。

sentences.en: The hunter trailed the wounded buffalo through the bush.
sentences.cn: 猎人在灌木丛中追踪那只受伤的美洲野牛.

sentences.en: The water buffalo squelched up and down the paddy fields, pulling the plough.
sentences.cn: 水牛拉着犁,在稻田里咕唧咕唧地走着.

sentences.en: They kept shivering beneath the buffalo robes and hugging each other.
sentences.cn: 她们一直在牛皮车毯下面瑟瑟发抖,并互相拥抱着取暖.

sentences.en: To remind American citizens to protect the environment, the government issued this buffalo nickel.
sentences.cn: 为了提醒美国公民保护环境，政府就发行了这种野牛镍币。

sentences.en: You can see the fresh buffalo dung on the country road.
sentences.cn: 你可以在乡间小路上看到刚屙下不久的水牛粪.

words.tran_cn: [畜牧][脊椎]水牛；野牛（产于北美）；水陆两用坦克

trans.tran_en: an African animal similar to a large cow with long curved horns
